definitions.text: the time at which something is supposed to begin
examples: she knew from the get-go that he was the man for her

definitions.text: a horizontal branch from the base of plant that produces new plants from buds at its tips
a plate makes an inked impression on a rubber-blanketed cylinder, which in turn transfers it to the paper
structure where a wall or building narrows abruptly

examples: His skills offset his opponent's superior strength

definitions.text: cause (printed matter) to transfer or smear onto another surface
